original: yin par gyur la bya ba med //
analyzed: yin par gyur la bya ba med //
translated: And that which is an existent does not have activity.

original: ces bya bas byed pa po yin par gyur pa las yin par gyur pa mi byed par rjes su dpag pa'i skabs su bstan pa bzhin du @161b sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: ces bya bas byed pa po yin par gyur pa las yin par gyur pa mi byed par rjes su dpag pa'i skabs su bstan pa bzhin du @161b sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: This should be applied in the same way as it is explained in the context of the inference that that which is an existent agent does not perform that which is an existent action.

original: de ltar na dam 'cha' bar byed pa'i dam bcas pa la rjes su dpag pas gnod par 'gyur bas /
analyzed: de ltar na dam 'cha' bar byed pa'i dam bcas pa la rjes su dpag pas gnod par 'gyur bas /
translated: Thus, since the thesis of the opponent is undermined by the inference of the Madhyamaka,

original: byed pa po dang las dag ltos pa med par yod pa de ni mi 'dod de /
analyzed: byed pa po dang las dag ltos pa med par yod pa de ni mi 'dod de /
translated: the existence of the agent and action without mutual dependence is unacceptable.

original: de'i phyir byed pa po dag las dag ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid du 'dod pa kho nar bya'o zhes bya ba ni mjug bsdu ba yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir byed pa po dag las dag ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid du 'dod pa kho nar bya'o zhes bya ba ni mjug bsdu ba yin te /
translated: Therefore, it should be accepted that the agent and action definitely exist in mutual dependence. This is the summary.

original: de ltar pha rol po'i dam bcas pa de la dbu ma pa'i rjes su dpag pas gnod par 'gyur bas byed pa po dang las bya ba dang ldan pa phan tshun ltos pa med pa dag mi srid pa'i phyir mi 'dod de /
analyzed: de ltar pha rol po'i dam bcas pa de la dbu ma pa'i rjes su dpag pas gnod par 'gyur bas byed pa po dang las bya ba dang ldan pa phan tshun ltos pa med pa dag mi srid pa'i phyir mi 'dod de /
translated: Since the thesis of the opponent is undermined by the inference of the Madhyamaka, the existence of the agent and action without mutual dependence is unacceptable.

original: byed pa po dang las bya ba dang mi ldan pa phan tshun ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid du 'dod pa kho nar bya'o //
analyzed: byed pa po dang las bya ba dang mi ldan pa phan tshun ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid du 'dod pa kho nar bya'o //
translated: One should only assert that the agent and the object of action are mutually dependent, but not that they possess activity.

original: des na don dam par byed pa po lhas byin zhes bya ba ni lhas byin gyi rgyud la las byed pa po'i rgyud la gdon mi za bar rnam par smin par 'gyur ba mi byed par shes par byar nus te /
analyzed: des na don dam par byed pa po lhas byin zhes bya ba ni lhas byin gyi rgyud la las byed pa po'i rgyud la gdon mi za bar rnam par smin par 'gyur ba mi byed par shes par byar nus te /
translated: Therefore, in the ultimate truth, it is possible to understand that the so-called agent Devadatta does not perform the action in the continuum of Devadatta, because it is certain that the continuum of the agent does not perform the action.

original: ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir dper na mchod sbyin bzhin no zhes bya ba ni byed pa po yin par gyur pa las yin par gyur pa mi byed par bsgrubs pa'i tshad ma'i 'bras bu rjes su dpag pa gzhan gyis bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir dper na mchod sbyin bzhin no zhes bya ba ni byed pa po yin par gyur pa las yin par gyur pa mi byed par bsgrubs pa'i tshad ma'i 'bras bu rjes su dpag pa gzhan gyis bstan pa yin te /
translated: Because it is dependent, like a sacrifice. This is the result of valid knowledge that proves that an actual agent does not perform an actual action, and it is taught by another inference.

original: de dag kyang chos can dang / bsgrub par bya ba chos dang / sgrub pa'i chos dang / dpe yin par go rims bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de dag kyang chos can dang / bsgrub par bya ba chos dang / sgrub pa'i chos dang / dpe yin par go rims bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: Those are the subject, the predicate to be proven, the reason, and the example, respectively.

original: dper na byed pa po yin par gyur pa mchod sbyin zhes bya ba ni las la ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir don dam par lhas byin gyi rgyud la las yin par gyur pa byed pa po'i rgyud la gdon mi za bar rnam par smin par 'gyur ba
analyzed: dper na byed pa po yin par gyur pa mchod sbyin zhes bya ba ni las la ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir don dam par lhas byin gyi rgyud la las yin par gyur pa byed pa po'i rgyud la gdon mi za bar rnam par smin par 'gyur ba
translated: For example, it is possible to know that the ultimate activity of the action that is the object of the activity of the existent agent called Yaj√±adatta does not exist in the continuum of the agent called Yaj√±adatta because the activity of Yaj√±adatta is dependent on the object.üîΩIn the same way, it is possible to know that the ultimate activity of the action that is the object of the activity of the agent called Devadatta does not exist in the continuum of the agent called Devadatta because the activity of Devadatta is dependent on the object.

original: mi byed par shes par byar nus pa de bzhin du byed pa po yin par gyur pa lhas byin zhes bya ba yang las la ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir don dam par lhas byin gyi rgyud la las yin par gyur pa byed pa po'i rgyud las donüîΩmi za bar rnam par smin par 'gyur ba mi byed par shes par byar nus so //
analyzed: mi byed par shes par byar nus pa de bzhin du byed pa po yin par gyur pa lhas byin zhes bya ba yang las la ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir don dam par lhas byin gyi rgyud la las yin par gyur pa byed pa po'i rgyud las don mi za bar rnam par smin par 'gyur ba mi byed par shes par byar nus so //
translated: In the same way, it is possible to know that the ultimate activity of the action that is the object of the activity of the agent in the continuum of Devadatta does not exist in the continuum of the agent called Devadatta because the activity of Devadatta is dependent on the object.

original: de bzhin du don dam par lhas byin gyi rgyud kyi las byed pa po la gdon mi za bar rnam par smin par 'gyur ba ni byed pa po lhas byin gyi bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du don dam par lhas byin gyi rgyud kyi las byed pa po la gdon mi za bar rnam par smin par 'gyur ba ni byed pa po lhas byin gyi bya ba ma yin te /
translated: In the same way, it is possible to know that the ultimate activity of the action that is the object of the activity of the agent in the continuum of Devadatta does not exist in the continuum of the agent called Devadatta because the activity of Devadatta is dependent on the object.

original: byed pa po la ltos pa'i phyir dper na mchod sbyin gyi rgyud kyi las bzhin no zhes bya ba na las yin par 'gyur ba byed pa po yin par gyur pa'i bya ba ma yin par bsgrubs pa'i tshad ma'i 'bras bu rjes su dpag pa gzhan gyis bstanüîΩpa yin te /
analyzed: byed pa po la ltos pa'i phyir dper na mchod sbyin gyi rgyud kyi las bzhin no zhes bya ba na las yin par 'gyur ba byed pa po yin par gyur pa'i bya ba ma yin par bsgrubs pa'i tshad ma'i 'bras bu rjes su dpag pa gzhan gyis bstan pa yin te /
translated: ‚ÄúBecause it depends on the agent, like the action in the continuum of a sacrificer.‚Äù

original: de dag kyang chos can dang / bsgrub par bya ba chos dang / sgrub pa'i chos dang / dpe yin par go rims bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de dag kyang chos can dang / bsgrub par bya ba chos dang / sgrub pa'i chos dang / dpe yin par go rims bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: Those are the subject, the predicate of the probandum, the logical reason, and the example, respectively.

original: dper @162a * //
analyzed: dper @162a * //
translated: For example,

original: na mchod sbyin gyi rgyud kyi las yin par gyur pa ni byed pa po la ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir don dam par byed pa po yin par gyur pa lhas byin gyi bya ba ma yin pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: na mchod sbyin gyi rgyud kyi las yin par gyur pa ni byed pa po la ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir don dam par byed pa po yin par gyur pa lhas byin gyi bya ba ma yin pa de bzhin du /
translated: the action that is an existent in the continuum of a sacrificer is not the action of the ultimately existent agent Devadatta because it depends on the agent.

original: lhas byin gyi rgyud kyi las yin par gyur pa byed pa po la gdon mi za bar rnam par smin par 'gyur ba yang byed pa po la ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir don dam par byed pa po yin par gyur pa lhas byin gyi bya ba ma
analyzed: lhas byin gyi rgyud kyi las yin par gyur pa byed pa po la gdon mi za bar rnam par smin par 'gyur ba yang byed pa po la ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir don dam par byed pa po yin par gyur pa lhas byin gyi bya ba ma
translated: The karma that is the object of the action of Devadatta, which is the karma that definitely ripens for the agent, is not the action of Devadatta, the agent who is the object of the action.üîΩBecause it is dependent on the agent. Thus, first the meaning of the thesis is established. The agent who is not an agent of the karma that is the object of the action and the karma that is the object of the action is not the action of the agent who is the object of the action.

original: yin no // de ltar re zhig dam bcas pa'i don nye bar gzhag pa snga ma bsgrubs zin te byed pa po yin par gyur pa las yin par gyur pa mi byed pa dang / las yin par gyur pa byed pa po yin par gyur pa'i bya ba ma yin par brtag pa dang po bstan zin to //
analyzed: yin no // de ltar re zhig dam bcas pa'i don nye bar gzhag pa snga ma bsgrubs zin te byed pa po yin par gyur pa las yin par gyur pa mi byed pa dang / las yin par gyur pa byed pa po yin par gyur pa'i bya ba ma yin par brtag pa dang po bstan zin to //
translated: The first chapter has been explained.

original: da ni dam bcas pa'i don nye bar gzhag pa gnyis pa bsgrub pa'i phyir bshad pa zhes bya bas ni byed pa po ma yin par gyur pa las ma yin par gyur pa mi byed pa dang / las ma yin par gyur pa byed pa po ma yin par gyur pa'i bya ba ma yin par brtag pa gnyis bston to //
analyzed: da ni dam bcas pa'i don nye bar gzhag pa gnyis pa bsgrub pa'i phyir bshad pa zhes bya bas ni byed pa po ma yin par gyur pa las ma yin par gyur pa mi byed pa dang / las ma yin par gyur pa byed pa po ma yin par gyur pa'i bya ba ma yin par brtag pa gnyis bston to //
translated: Now, in order to establish the second point of the promise, ‚ÄúNow, the explanation,‚Äù he teaches two examinations: that an unreal agent does not perform an unreal action, and that an unreal action is not the action of an unreal agent.

original: gal te byed por ma gyur pa //
analyzed: gal te byed por ma gyur pa //
translated: If an unreal agent

original: las su ma gyur byed na ni //
analyzed: las su ma gyur byed na ni //
translated: Performed an unreal action,

original: zhes bya ba ni phyogs bsnan pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni phyogs bsnan pa yin no //
translated: This is an addition to the position.

original: des cir 'gyur zhes bya ba ni pha rol po'i 'dri ba'i tshig yin no //
analyzed: des cir 'gyur zhes bya ba ni pha rol po'i 'dri ba'i tshig yin no //
translated: What would be the consequence? This is a question from the opponent.

original: de'i lan du /
analyzed: de'i lan du /
translated: In response to that, he says:

original: las la rgyu ni med par 'gyur //
analyzed: las la rgyu ni med par 'gyur //
translated: The action would be without a cause.üîΩBecause it would be established without an agent.

original: byed pa po med par yang grub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni byed pa po ma yin par gyur par rtog na de bya ba dang mi ldan pas las mi byed la /
analyzed: byed pa po med par yang grub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni byed pa po ma yin par gyur par rtog na de bya ba dang mi ldan pas las mi byed la /
translated: If one imagines that an unreal agent does not possess activity, then the action is not performed.

original: des ma byas par yang las grub pa'i phyir las la rgyu med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: des ma byas par yang las grub pa'i phyir las la rgyu med par 'gyur te /
translated: And because the action is established without being performed by that, the action would be without a cause.

original: las kyi rgyu ni byed pa po yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: las kyi rgyu ni byed pa po yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The cause of action is the agent.

original: byed pa po yang rgyu med 'gyur //
analyzed: byed pa po yang rgyu med 'gyur //
translated: The agent would be without a cause.üîΩBecause the agent would not perform the action and would not rely on the action.

original: byed pa po las mi byed pa dang las la mi ltos pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni las ma yin par gyur par rtog na de bya ba dang mi ldan pas byed pa po'i bya ba ma yin pas byed pa po las mi byed cing
analyzed: byed pa po las mi byed pa dang las la mi ltos pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni las ma yin par gyur par rtog na de bya ba dang mi ldan pas byed pa po'i bya ba ma yin pas byed pa po las mi byed cing
translated: If one imagines that the action does not exist, then since it would not possess activity, the agent would not perform the action because it would not be the activity of an agent.

original: las la mi ltos pa'i phyir byed pa po rgyu med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: las la mi ltos pa'i phyir byed pa po rgyu med par 'gyur te /
translated: And because the agent would not rely on the action, the agent would be without a cause.

original: byed pa po'i rgyu ni las yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byed pa po'i rgyu ni las yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the cause of the agent is the action.üîΩThis half-verse also teaches that the phenomena of the agent and action and the mutual dependence of action and agent are untenable.

original: tshig le'ur byas pa'i phyed 'dis kyang byed pa po dang las kyi chos byed pa dang / las dag phan tshun ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid bstan to zhes bya ba ni byed pa po ma yin par gyur pa las ma yin par gyur pa mi byed pa dang /
analyzed: tshig le'ur byas pa'i phyed 'dis kyang byed pa po dang las kyi chos byed pa dang / las dag phan tshun ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid bstan to zhes bya ba ni byed pa po ma yin par gyur pa las ma yin par gyur pa mi byed pa dang /
translated: The non-agent does not perform the non-action.

original: las ma yin par gyur pa byed pa po ma yin par gyur pa'i bya ba ma yin par bsgrub pa'i chos gtan tshigs ni de dag phan tshun ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: las ma yin par gyur pa byed pa po ma yin par gyur pa'i bya ba ma yin par bsgrub pa'i chos gtan tshigs ni de dag phan tshun ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid yin te /
translated: The reason that proves the thesis that an unreal agent does not perform an unreal action is that they are mutually dependent.

original: byed pa po yang las la ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid yin pa'i phyir byed pa po ma yin par gyur pa mi srid par de @162b las ma yin par gyur pa mi byed la /
analyzed: byed pa po yang las la ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid yin pa'i phyir byed pa po ma yin par gyur pa mi srid par de @162b las ma yin par gyur pa mi byed la /
translated: Since the agent is dependent on the action, it is impossible for there to be an unreal agent, and so it does not perform an unreal action.

original: las kyang byed pa po la ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: las kyang byed pa po la ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Since the action is dependent on the agent,

original: las ma yin par gyur pa mi srid pas de byed pa po ma yin par gyur pa'i bya ba ma yin no zhes ston to //
analyzed: las ma yin par gyur pa mi srid pas de byed pa po ma yin par gyur pa'i bya ba ma yin no zhes ston to //
translated: it is impossible for there to be an unreal action, and so it is not performed by an unreal agent.

original: 'dir chos mthun pa'i dpe yang mchod sbyin byed pa po ma yin par gyur pa dang / mchod sbyin gyi las ma yin par gyur pa gang dag la /
analyzed: 'dir chos mthun pa'i dpe yang mchod sbyin byed pa po ma yin par gyur pa dang / mchod sbyin gyi las ma yin par gyur pa gang dag la /
translated: Here, the concordant example is that an unreal agent does not perform an unreal action, such as an unperformed sacrifice.

original: bsgrub par bya ba chos des de mi byed pa dang / de de'i bya ba ma yin pa dang / bsgrub pa'i chos phan tshun ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid yod pa dag yin par sbyar ro //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba chos des de mi byed pa dang / de de'i bya ba ma yin pa dang / bsgrub pa'i chos phan tshun ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid yod pa dag yin par sbyar ro //
translated: The probandum is that the property to be established does not perform that, that is not its action, and the property to be established has mutual dependence.

original: 'dir rjes su dpag pa ni byed pa po dang las phyogs su byas pa la yang snga ma bzhin te /
analyzed: 'dir rjes su dpag pa ni byed pa po dang las phyogs su byas pa la yang snga ma bzhin te /
translated: Here, the inference is that the agent and action are taken as the subject, as before.

original: khyad par ni byed pa po dang las ma yin par gyur pa dag phyogs su bya ba yin no zhes bya ba ni sngar byed pa po yin par gyur pa las yin par gyur pa mi byed par bsgrub pa'i phyogs kyi rjes su dpag pa dang /
analyzed: khyad par ni byed pa po dang las ma yin par gyur pa dag phyogs su bya ba yin no zhes bya ba ni sngar byed pa po yin par gyur pa las yin par gyur pa mi byed par bsgrub pa'i phyogs kyi rjes su dpag pa dang /
translated: The difference is that the non-agent and non-action are taken as the subject. This is the inference of the subject that proves that the existent agent does not perform the existent action.

original: brgal ba dang lan ci skad bstan pa de las bzlog ste /
analyzed: brgal ba dang lan ci skad bstan pa de las bzlog ste /
translated: The objections and responses are the opposite of what was explained before.

original: 'dir byed pa po ma yin par gyur pa las ma yin par gyur pa mi byed par bsgrub pa'i phyogs la ni don dam par byed pa po ma yin par gyur pa lhas byin ni lhas byin gyi rgyud la las ma yin par gyur pa mi byed deüîΩltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir dpe na mchod sbyin byed pa po ma yin par gyur pa bzhin zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'dir byed pa po ma yin par gyur pa las ma yin par gyur pa mi byed par bsgrub pa'i phyogs la ni don dam par byed pa po ma yin par gyur pa lhas byin ni lhas byin gyi rgyud la las ma yin par gyur pa mi byed de ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir dpe na mchod sbyin byed pa po ma yin par gyur pa bzhin zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Here, in the context of proving that an unreal agent does not perform an unreal action, ultimately, Devadatta, who is an unreal agent, does not perform an unreal action in Devadatta‚Äôs continuum because he is dependent, just as, for example, Yaj√±a, who is an unreal agent, does not perform a real action.

original: de bzhin du sngar las ma yin par gyur pa byed pa po yin par gyur pa'i bya ba ma yin par bsgrub pa'i phyogs kyi rjes su dpag pa dang // brgal ba dang lan ji skad bstan pa de las bzlog ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du sngar las ma yin par gyur pa byed pa po yin par gyur pa'i bya ba ma yin par bsgrub pa'i phyogs kyi rjes su dpag pa dang // brgal ba dang lan ji skad bstan pa de las bzlog ste /
translated: Similarly, the reverse of the previously explained proof statement, inference, and response in the context of proving that a real action is not performed by an unreal agent is as follows.

original: 'dir las ma yin par gyur pa byed pa po ma yin par gyur pa'i bya ba ma yin par bsgrub pa'i phyogs la ni don dam par lhas byin gyi rgyud kyi las ma yin par gyur pa ni byed pa po bdag lhas byin ma yin par gyur pa'i
analyzed: 'dir las ma yin par gyur pa byed pa po ma yin par gyur pa'i bya ba ma yin par bsgrub pa'i phyogs la ni don dam par lhas byin gyi rgyud kyi las ma yin par gyur pa ni byed pa po bdag lhas byin ma yin par gyur pa'i
translated: Here, in the context of proving that Devadatta, who is not an existent agent, does not perform an existent action, ultimately the action that is not an existent in the continuum of Devadatta is not performed by the self that is not an existent agent, Devadatta.üîΩ

original: bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: bya ba ma yin te /
translated: Here, in the context of proving that Devadatta, who is not an existent agent, does not perform an existent action, the existent action in the continuum of Devadatta is not the action of the agent, Devadatta, who is not an existent agent.

original: ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir dper na mchod sbyin gyi rgyud kyi las ma yin par gyur pa bzhin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir dper na mchod sbyin gyi rgyud kyi las ma yin par gyur pa bzhin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: This is because it is dependent, like the existent action in the continuum of Yaj√±adatta.

original: ci ste yang 'ga' zhig kho bo cag la byed pa po dang las dag ni 'di lta ste rang dbang ni byed pa po'o //
analyzed: ci ste yang 'ga' zhig kho bo cag la byed pa po dang las dag ni 'di lta ste rang dbang ni byed pa po'o //
translated: But if someone says to us, ‚ÄúThe agent and action are like this: The independent is the agent.
